creator: rambiusparkisanius@yahoo.com
text:
I tried to execute the following ant script:

<project>
    <property name="prefix" value=""/>
    <echo>$${prefix} is ${prefix}</echo>
    <!-- Dumps all properties starting with the prefix -->
    <echoproperties prefix="${prefix}"/>
</project>

Technically speaking, the empty string is a prefix for every string and I
expected that all properties will be echoed. Instead, the build failed with the
following error:

Invalid attribute: prefix

I patched the task to dump all properties when the prefix is the empty string
and I am attaching the patch.

Created attachment 18553
Patches EchoProperties task to accept an empty prefix

Patches EchoProperties task to accept an empty prefix. Provides unit tests for
the patch.
creator: rambiusparkisanius@yahoo.com

text:
applied to HEAD (with null check).

Thanks!
creator: mbenson@apache.org
